title: Msthcoin
author: Msthcoin
content: Sup guys, hope everyone is well. I just discovered this Forum again and wanted to share with all degens out there a (nearly) 4 months old sports betting and gambling project that i am involved in PEPE.BET & Casino had a successfully tested V1 Platform. The total amount deposited to PEPEBET v1 was 82 152 USD with limited sports betting and without casino section. Slot games from 32 different game providers, most notably @PragmaticPlay üî•üé∞FIAT purchase gateway üíµ integration that will LEGALLY allow players to deposit $USDT, $ETH, and most importantly #PEPEBET to their PEPEBET/CASINO account with their credit cards. #PEPEBET tokens are purchased directly from the market. üìàLicensing üìãlegal partners for the incorporation and Curacao licensing process found. The whole procedure will begin in February. Affiliate Programm üë•highest-paying affiliate systems on the market, based on the invited users' wager amount. By the estimations, 100k USD wagered on the website, it will get ~ in between 200 and 400 USD reward depending on the number of active players you have invited. üíµReal World Marketing üåêlong-term partnership with a tier 1 "celebrity". not only a video and social media mention, to be the face of our platform, and participate in competitions and special events. Negotiating with Twitch streamers, YouTubers, and casino-comparison sites üëÄPEPE.BET & PEPE.CASINO üê∏The new website launches with 4 supported languages: English, Chinese, Spanish, and French. PEPEBET is not a crypto project, but a real-world business that is leveraging all the best features of the two worlds. üè¢Good luck and always DYOR ! üî•üê∏Twitter: https://twitter.com/pepebettokenTelegram: https://t.me/pepebetverificationWebsite: https://pepe.bet/Chart: https://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0xaa2a34b024e3bdfd9d8ed64374a276631216f33a
